name: Lenovo Vibe X2-AP (Gold)
description:
13MP primary camera with auto focus, LED flash and 5MP front facing camera with fixed focus
							
						
					
						 
							5-inch (12.7 centimeters) full HD multi-touch capacitive touchscreen with 1920 x 1080 pixels resolution
							
						
					
						 
							Android v4.4 KitKat operating system with 2GHz MediaTek 6595m octa core processor, 2GB RAM, 32GB internal memory, dual micro and nano SIM (GSM+GSM)
							
						
					
						 
							2300mAH lithium-polymer embedded battery providing talk-time of 15.5 hours on 2G, 11 hours on 3G/4G and standby time of 180 hours on 2G, 204 hours on 3G and 180 hours on 4G networks
							
						
					
						 
							1 year manufacturer warranty for device and 6 months manufacturer warranty for in-box accessories including batteries from the date of purchase
